DOC.brief_summary: A Phase 1 , Single-centre , Double-blind , Placebo control Crossover Study Assess pharmacoMRI Effects AUT00206 Healthy Male Participants
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess pharmacoMRI Effects AUT00206 Healthy Males
DOC.criteria: Male age 18 45 year , inclusive Visit 1 . Healthy basis medical history , psychiatric history , physical examination , vital sign , 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , haematology , blood chemistry urinalysis within 6 week Visit 2 . Righthanded . Not regular smoker ( maximum 5 cigarette per week equivalent ) . History , current condition , migraine headache undergone operation head . History significant claustrophobia .
